emitDateTime.description: The dateTime parameter formatted as 'date-time', java.util.Date or java.time.ZoneDateTime

emitDate.description: The date parameter formatted as 'date', String or java.time.LocalDate

emitTime.description: The time parameter formatted as 'time', String or java.time.LocalTime

emitMillisec.description: The dateTime parameter formatted as 'date', long
